title: WiFi problem!
content: My WiFi will randomly disconnect and after a second it will reconnect and work normally, it's been happening for a while, I tried forgetting the WiFi and reconnecting to it but it still happens, I tried turning the WiFi router on and off but I have no clue how to stop this from happening, none of my other devices do this it's only my pixel
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
